name: 量性研究方法
description: Over the past few years, statistical methods have been used more and more widely in various issues and topics concerning translation and interpretation, but they have still received little attention as a distinct area of research in the growing body of translation studies. In this class, we are going to explore how to validate findings in translation studies with statistical methods to increase our knowledge about translation and interpretation.
goals: After taking this course, you will be able to make sense of the logic that underlies the use of statistics and to use statistics as a useful tool to do studies concerning translation activities.
syllabus:
授課方式：16+2週：彈性教學授課方式以學生自主學習和撰寫研究專題報告為主。

Over the past few years, statistical methods have been used more and more widely in various issues and topics concerning translation, but they have still received little attention as a distinct area of research in the growing body of translation studies. In this class, we are going to explore how to validate findings in translation studies with statistical methods to increase our knowledge about translation. After taking this course, you will be able to make sense of the logic that underlies the use of statistics and to use statistics as a useful tool to do studies concerning translation activities.

Course description

*   Introduction: course overview
*   What is research? Variables; Data organization (_Understanding research in second language learning_: p.1-28)

*   Preparing (_Quantitative research methods in translation and interpreting studies_: Ch. 1- Ch. 3)

*   問卷設計觀念與經驗談 (《問卷就是要這樣編》: Ch. 1- Ch.3)

*   問卷設計流程、內容、題目撰擬 (《問卷就是要這樣編》: Ch. 4- Ch. 6)

*   問卷專家評定與編製實例與反思(《問卷就是要這樣編》:  Ch. 9; Ch.11)

報告論文：Pöchhacker, F. (2009). Conference interpreting: Surveying the profession. _Translation and Interpreting Studies, 4_(2), 172–186.

*   Designing studies in corpus linguistics (_Research methodologies in translation studies_: p.61-95.)

報告論文：李克莉、邵斌 (2016) 〈基於語料庫的《一九八四》中譯本譯者翻譯策略考察〉，《編譯論叢》，第9卷第1期，頁101-130。

學習統計基本觀念、SPSS視窗、問卷分析(《統計就是要這樣跑》: Ch. 1, Ch. 3, Ch.4)

*   Descriptive statistics; probability distributions (_Quantitative research methods in translation and interpreting studies_: Ch. 4)
*   集中量數、變異量數、相對地位量數 (《統計就是要這樣跑》: Ch. 5- Ch. 7)

報告論文：林慶隆、陳子瑋、彭致翎、何承恩、張舜芬、吳培若 (2016)〈臺灣政府單位翻譯需求及人力資源問題分析〉，《編譯論叢》，第9卷第2期，頁23-56。

*   Statistical terminology and one-sample tests (_Quantitative research methods in translation and interpreting studies_: Ch. 5-Ch. 6)
*   推論統計 (《統計就是要這樣跑》: Ch. 8)

報告論文：Setton, R., & Guo, L. A. (2009). Attitudes to role, status and professional identity in interpreters and translators with Chinese in Shanghai and Taipei. _Translation and Interpreting Studies_, _4_(2), 201-238.

*   Nunan, D. (1992). The experimental method, _Research methods in language learning_ (pp. 24-49): Cambridge University Press.
*   Comparing two groups (_Quantitative research methods in translation and interpreting studies_: Ch. 7)

報告論文：Cheung, A. (2008). Simultaneous interpreting of numbers: an experimental study. _Forum_, _6_(2), 23-38.

*   平均數的差異檢定t檢定 (《統計就是要這樣跑》: Ch. 12)
*   信度分析(《統計就是要這樣跑》: Ch. 10)

報告論文： Rosiers, A., & Eyckmans, J. (2017). Investigating tolerance of ambiguity in novice and expert translators and interpreters: An exploratory study. _Translation & Interpreting_, _9_(2), 52-66.

*   Comparing multiple groups (_Quantitative research methods in translation and interpreting studies_: Ch. 8)

報告論文：范家銘 (2012) Interpreters’ views on the necessary aptitudes of interpreters，《編譯論叢》，第5卷第2期，頁117-151。

*   變異數分析 (《統計就是要這樣跑》: Ch. 13)

報告論文：Kopke, B., & Nespoulous, J.-L. (2006). Working memory performance in expert and novice interpreters. _Interpreting_, _8_(1), 1-23.

報告論文：張威 (2011) 〈同聲傳譯與工作記憶關的調查與分析〉，《口譯認知研究：同聲傳譯與工作記憶的關係》，頁46-71，北京:外語教學與研究。。

*   Testing categorical data (_Quantitative research methods in translation and interpreting studies_: Ch. 10)
*   卡方檢定 (《統計就是要這樣跑》: Ch. 11)

報告論文：齊濤云、楊承淑 (2019)〈職業譯員英中同步口譯的停頓時長特徵與認知分析—基於小型自建多模態口譯語料庫的個案研究〉，《翻譯學研究集刊》，第23輯，頁23-52。

*   Correlation and reliability (_Quantitative research methods in translation and interpreting studies_: Ch. 11)
*   相關係數 (《統計就是要這樣跑》: Ch. 9)

報告論文：Wu, Z. (2016). Towards understanding interpreter trainees' (de)motivation: An exploratory study. _Translation & Interpreting, 8_(2), 13-25.

*   因素分析 (《統計就是要這樣跑》: Ch. 17)

報告論文：Ebrahimi, N. A. (2013). Constructivist Translation Classroom Environment Survey (CTLES): Development, Validation and Application. _Translation & Interpreting, 5_(2), 163-186.
